Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Eidenhoft Boulevard, southwest of Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection of Overland Drive lies to the northeast. From that intersection, Eidenhoft runs due north. Eidenhoft Boulevard is one of the easiest streets to remember since it is one of the few that travel diagonally through the town. Heading southwest down Eidenhoft brings you towards the Oeancrest Memorial Fountain and eventually towards the southwestern corner of Oceancrest.
